title: Best Of The Herd
itunes:title: Best Of The Herd
description:
In the best of, Doug talks about Kyler Murrays saga with Arizona Cardinals and them recently removing his film study clause. John Middlekauff joins to talk Lamar Jackson and the Ravens signing situation, as well as what the Angels should do with Shohei Ohtani and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
